snippet.title: Trolling Bowling - Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Demo
snippet.description:
A wild & fun multiplayer party game bowling simulator to compete with your friends, where it’s troll or be trolled. Sabotage your friends with trolling powers like concrete pins, oil spills, windmills, and more! Upgrade your bowling ball. Bowl to score points, collect rings, and send pins flying!

Developed by Travis Soules
Release Date: TBD

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #theforeseenarcade #steamnextfest #steamnextfestfebruary2025 #bowling #trollingbowling
